original_text: The men of Israel took captive from their fellow Israelites who were from Judah two hundred thousand wives, sons and daughters. They also took a great deal of plunder, which they carried back to Samaria.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그들의 형제 중에서 그들의 아내와 자녀를 합하여 이십만 명을 사로잡고 그들의 재물을 많이 노략하여 사마리아로 가져가니

sentences.original_text: The men of Israel took captive
two hundred thousand wives, sons and daughters
They also took a great deal of plunder
which they carried back to Samaria
